FuncDef: This command configures the line signal degradation bit error rate (BER) and line signal failure thresholds.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the BER that specifies signal degradation.
Specifies the BER that specifies signal failure.
The BER negative exponent (n in 10-n), expressed as a decimal integer. Values-3 to 9 (10-3 to 10-9) for ber-sd, 3 to 6 for ber-sf.

ExtraInfo: Default: threshold ber-sd rate 6 - Signal degrade BER threshold of 10-6.threshold ber-sf rate 3 - Signal failure BER threshold of 10-3.
